page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: OUR WARMEST THANKS EXTENDED TO THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL, STRATHMARTINE W.R.I., LEADERS OF THE YOUTH CLUB, MR. FISHER, ADMINISTRATION DEPARTMENT, STRATHMARTINE HOSPITAL, MR. CLARK, LOCAL INHABITANT. THE FOLLOWING PUPILS OF STRATHMARTINE SCHOOL:- AILSA REID, KIRSTEEN DUFFY, GILLIAN MURDACH, JEANETTE REID, PHILIP STOTT, SIMON BOLGER, RHYDDIAN JOHN, WAYNE STRACHAN, WILLIAM STOTT, MICHELLE BANKS, LOUISE GARVIE, CHRISTIAN JOHN, ALUN PATERSON, CAROL FINDLAY, LEIGH SYMINGTON, BARRIE JOHN CLARK, GAVIN LAING, SUSAN REID, CARLA KELLY, JENNIFER MITCHELL, FIONA KENNEDY, FIONA GIBB, GRANT PATERSON, CHARLES WILSON, MICHAEL BOLGER, BOBBY MCGRATH, ARLENE COYNE, LYNN SMITH, PAULINE REID, ADRIAN BANKS. MRS. BLACK, HEAD TEACHER, AND MRS. HOW, ASSISTANT TEACHER.
